name: Immunization Calculation Engine
description: ICE is an open source immunization evaluation and forecasting clinical decision support system

sdgs.relevance: ICE promotes best practices for immunization to ensure that infectious diseases that can be controlled through vaccination are contained.

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

privacy.privacyComplianceURL: Under US law, clinical decision support system calls that include any of the HIPAA-identified demographic fields (such as date of birth) are considered Protected Health Information and as such fall under HIPAA's privacy and security rules if they come from what is referred to as a "covered entity," typically a clinical site or health insurance provider. As ICE does not retain any of this data, and typically requires an encrypted connection to make calls to its service, we do not believe it exposes PHI in any way in violation of this regulation. In addition, ICE uses the absolute minimum of PHI - just date of birth and gender - which cannot be easily connected to a patient by themselves.
